title: 13 'Joker' Memes So Funny Even Joaquin Phoenix Will Have A Good Laugh
text:
When Heath Ledger brought to life Gotham City's Joker in Christopher Nolan's Batman movies, we witnessed a different kind of superhero rise.

A kind where everything bad was made more humane and it's safe to say, celebrated. Naturally then, it din't come as a surprise when Academy Awards favourite, Joaquin Phoenix was roped into to play the latest Joker. The movie released worldwide on October 4 and has been hailed as the best film of the year.

And if a movie that is such a raging hit, how can the Internet keep calm? Evidently, Joker memes were all we saw on Instagram stories, Facebook timelines and obviously tweets. Below, we have collected the best Joker movie memes that are incredibly funny and will make you want to watch this blockbuster all over again. Oh, and, we bet Joaquin Phoenix will himself find these funny.
